snippet: With no splashy offseason additions to the team, the Mets are counting on improvements from its existing players, particularly recuperating pitcher Johan Santana.
abstract: With no splashy offseason additions to the team, the Mets are counting on improvements from its existing players, particularly recuperating pitcher Johan Santana.
lead_paragraph: Several weeks after reaching contract agreements with relievers Frank Francisco and Jon Rauch, the Mets introduced the pitchers on a conference call with reporters Thursday. Unlike many off-seasons, there has been no need for a news conference at the ballpark to show off a splashy new addition.

headline.main: Alderson Says Mets Must Improve From Within
